column4: any ideas why i can ssh with public key authentication but scp fails?
in what way does it fail? what are the errors?
the authentication fails and it rolls back to key-board interactive but user password doesn't work
hmm, are you certain that you try to acces the same host in both cases?
i think my syntax is correct
I was not talking about syntax - one common error is a wrong IP address
ah, yes I am certain the IP address's are correct.  I'm trying to run the command locally instead of over ssh now to see if that fixes it
it looks like roaming not allowed by server is where my problems start
what has ssh/scp to do with roaming?
idk, but it says roaming not allowed by server then a ssh2_msg_service_request and accept happens and it rolls back to keyboard-interactive authentication
in that case I suggest you have a look into the server logs - thats the first time I hear of that
i'll take a look...thanks for your help!
nothing accomplished so far :-))  Good luck!
